title: Dragons tongue. - Series 2.
creator_credit: Robin James, Asian Studies Council, Griffith University and ABC-TV (Australia)
brief_description: A series of lessons in the Chinese language intended for high school students using simple vocabulary and brief dramatisations utilising the vocabulary. Includes short sections about life in modern China and a segment on Chinese writing and calligraphy. Introduced by Colin McKerras.
creator_credit_for_label: Robin James, Asian Studies Council, Griffith University and ABC-TV (Australia)
